title: Introduction to Programming
description: Fundamentals of programming. Perfect for beginners. Start your coding journey today.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Protect your digital world. Ethical hacking, security, and threat analysis. Become a cybersecurity expert.

title: Software Development Lifecycle
description: Master software development lifecycle. Requirements, design, coding, testing, deployment. Enhance your skills.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Essential web development skills. HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Become a web development pro.

title: Cloud Computing Essentials
description: Enter cloud computing confidently. Learn cloud models, deployment, and platforms. Ideal for IT pros.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Learn OOP with Python. Explore classes, objects, inheritance. Perfect starting point.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master database management with MySQL. Design, SQL, normalization. Cover novice to advanced.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Build solid data structure foundation. Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues. Essential for developers.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Create mobile apps for Android and iOS. Hands-on course. No coding experience needed.
